topic.topicTitle: Changing which Courses and Books appear on your homepage
topic.topicDialog: If other departments in your school are using Kerboodle, it may be that you want to hide their Courses and Books from your homepage.

step.stepTextTip: Once logged into Kerboodle, click on the Manage Courses button.

Tick the box to the left of the courses you'd like to show or hide on the homepage.

The 'green house' icon shows you which courses are already on your homepage.
Click on the Hide on Homepage or Show on Homepage button to make the changes.
These changes will take place immediately.
